info.title: Navigate backwards to a tab list in reading mode

setupScript.name: activateThirdTabAndSetFocusOnTabpanel
setupScript.description: activates the third tab in the tab list, and sets focus on the tab panel

user: Navigate to the tab list. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the tab list.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the tab list. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the tab list.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the tab list, 'Entertainment', is conveyed
Role of the selected item, 'tab', is conveyed
Name of the focused tab, 'Joke', is conveyed
State of the focused tab, 'selected', is conveyed
Position of the focused tab in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
